 2001-06892001-04-260,  ,  LAB,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS by including, for the purposes of bereavement leave, other close relatives in the definition of an employee's immediate family, and by replacing the term "common-law spouse" with "common-law partner".
